title: Hour 2 : Spooky Showdown
description:
In this Episode you will hear Dan Orlovsky reveal his Top 5 Scariest NFL Teams. Do you think you know who they will be? Ryan Clark discusses who is the bigger surprise between Vikings and Packers, and Playmaker gives us his TOP Playmakers of Week 8!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
